title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 495-2.3 - Restrictions on Use, Sale, Possession, and Release of SF[6]
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 495-2.3 - Restrictions on Use, Sale, Possession, and Release of SF[6]
State Regulations
(a) The following restrictions apply
beginning on the dates specified in section 495-2.3(b) of this Part. (1)

No person shall manufacture, produce, distribute, sell, or otherwise transfer SF
6
or equipment
containing SF
6
in New York State, except when the
intended use is provided in section 495-2.4 of this Part. (2)

No person shall purchase or use
SF
6
in New York State, except when the intended use is
provided in section 495-2.4 of this Part. (3)

No person shall own or otherwise possess
SF
6
in New York State, except when the intended use is
provided in section 495-2.4 of this Part. (4)

No person shall intentionally emit
SF
6
in New York State. Section 495-2.3(a) of this Part shall apply after the
dates specified in the following table: Application

Date
(1) Tracer gas testing, magnesium sand casting, magnesium investment casting, or military applications. January 1, 2028
(2) All other applications. January 1, 2026

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
495-2.3

Adopted

New

York State Register December 24, 2024/Volume XLVI, Issue 52, eff. 1/9/2025

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
